ygData.subject: Re: A wizards message board?
ygData.msgSnippet: Web based boards are nice, but it s kind of hard to hide a browser from a strolling manager that comes to talk to you...  : ) Zalbar 14th Wizard Solusek  Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Web based boards are nice, but it's kind of hard to hide a browser from a
strolling manager that comes to talk to you... : )

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro

P.S. You can make the trip from Queynos to Feydwer at around 8th. Just put
everything in the bank when you make the run. If anyone's REALLY interested
in making the trip and is worried about dying, gimme a call and I'll provide
escort/guide service.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mathieu Guillaume <mat@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: 21 avril, 1999 10:06
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: A wizards message board?


>From: Mathieu Guillaume <mat@...>
>
>
>On Wed, 21 Apr 1999, Paul McClung wrote:
>> There seems to be enough people to participate in this, would everyone
like
>> me to setup a wizards message board? Then all the email boxes can
breathe
>> easy? And we can still ask all the questions we want?
>
>NO !
>Web based boards are very slow to use and quite clumsy. I'd rather people
>learned to use filters or get the digest.
>
>Ramagh, Erudite Wizard, 3rd rank.
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Did you know that ONElist hosts some of the largest lists on the Internet?
>http://www.ONElist.com
>Our scaleable system is the most reliable free e-mail service on the
Internet!
>
